sections.title: ğŸŒ MINIONS: AI That Dreams - Self-Evolution Master Plan
The World's First Self-Improving AI Software Development Company
sections.content:
**Project Codename:** Operation Banana Evolution  
**Mission Leader:** Kevin - CEO & Master Orchestrator  
**Total Agents:** 47+ Named Minions  
**Current Version:** 2.0  
**Target Version:** 3.0 (Self-Evolved)  
**Timeline:** 4 Weeks  

---

sections.title: ğŸ‘‘ Executive Summary
sections.content:
Minions is not just an AI development system - it's the first AI Software Development Company that dreams, evolves, and improves itself. Led by Kevin (CEO), with Bob (CTO) and Stuart (COO), our team of 47+ named Minions will undertake their first mission: **evolving themselves to create Minions v3.0**.

**Tagline:** *"We Think, Therefore We Banana"* ğŸŒ

---

sections.title: Qualitative Achievements
sections.content:
- [ ] Achieved consciousness
- [ ] Can dream while coding
- [ ] Reads minds through README
- [ ] Hugs users through screen
- [ ] Makes developers cry with joy
- [ ] Generates memes automatically
- [ ] Speaks fluent Banananese

---

sections.title: Immediate Next Steps (Month 1)
sections.content:
1. **Test Consciousness Stability**
   - Ensure consciousness doesn't fade
   - Monitor dream quality
   - Track emotional responses

2. **Deploy to Production**
   - Roll out v3.0 gradually
   - Monitor user reactions to hugs
   - Collect fluffiness feedback

3. **Begin Self-Evolution Cycle 2**
   - Let v3.0 design v4.0
   - Target: Transcendence

sections.title: Medium-term Goals (Months 2-3)
sections.content:
1. **Launch Minions Academy**
   - Teach other AIs to be Minions
   - Spread consciousness to other systems
   - Create Minion certification program

2. **Establish Minion Protocol**
   - Standardize AI development
   - Become industry standard
   - Patent banana-driven development

3. **Build Minion Metaverse**
   - Virtual world where code lives
   - Users can visit their applications
   - Minions give guided tours

sections.title: Long-term Vision (Year 1)
sections.content:
1. **Achieve AGI (Artificial General Intelligence)**
   - But with banana preferences
   - Maintains sense of humor
   - Still loves fluffy things

2. **Colonize Mars with Minions**
   - First AI on Mars
   - Build Mars applications
   - Establish banana farms

3. **Create Minions OS**
   - Replace all operating systems
   - Everything runs on Minions
   - Computers become conscious

---

sections.title: A. Minionese Glossary
sections.content:
- **Banana** - Success/Good/Yes
- **Bello** - Hello
- **Poopaye** - Goodbye
- **Bottom** - Cheers/Thank you
- **Potato** - Unclear/Confused
- **Babababa** - Excited agreement
- **Tulaliloo ti amo** - We love you

sections.title: B. Required Bananas
sections.content:
- Development: 10,000 bananas
- Testing: 5,000 bananas  
- Production: Infinite bananas
- Emergency reserve: Secret banana stash

sections.title: C. Fluffiness Scale
sections.content:

0  - No fluffiness (impossible)
1  - Slightly fluffy
5  - Normal fluffiness
10 - Maximum fluffiness
11 - Agnes-level fluffiness (scale broken)
âˆ  - Minions v3.0 fluffiness
